title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the PairProgrammingSimulator, including the target audience, learning objectives, and desired features.

title: Design System Architecture for PairProgrammingSimulator: REVISED
description: Revised design of the overall system architecture of the PairProgrammingSimulator. Includes a detailed breakdown of frontend, backend, and database components, communication protocols, data flow, and integration with third-party services (if any). Considered scalability, maintainability, and performance requirements. Defined high-level components and their interactions. Utilized technologies such as React for the frontend, Node.js/Express for the backend, and MongoDB/PostgreSQL for the database. Included a discussion on potential use of GraphQL or REST APIs for communication between components.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and interactive components of the PairProgrammingSimulator.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the server-side logic, including the simulation engine, user management, and communication with the frontend.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, simulation scenarios, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop secure authentication and authorization mechanisms to protect user data and ensure proper access control.

title: Create Testing Framework
description: Set up a comprehensive testing framework, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the application.

title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline to automate the build, testing, and deployment processes, ensuring efficient and reliable software delivery.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, developer documentation, and API references, to facilitate the use and maintenance of the PairProgrammingSimulator.
